OUTER JOIN IBIMS010B IB010B ON IB010B.ARDY_BZEP_NO = IB201B.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO LEFT JOIN IBIMS101B IB101B ON IB201B.DEAL_NO = IB101B.DEAL_NO AND IB101B.LAST_YN = '1' LEFT JOIN IBIMS112B s112b ON s103b.DEAL_NO = s112b.DEAL_NO AND s103b.MTR_DCD = s112b.MTR_DCD AND s103b.JDGM_DCD = s112b.JDGM_DCD AND s103b.RISK_INSPCT_RSLTN_CCD = s112b.CNSB_DCD WHERE 1=1 AND IB201B.LAST_YN = '1'
AND IB201B.PRDT_CD LIKE '%' || #{prdtCd} || '%'
AND IB201B.PRDT_NM LIKE '%' || #{prdtNm} || '%'
AND IB201B.DEAL_NO = #{dealNo}
AND IB201B.NMCP_MTR_DCD = #{nmcpMtrDcd}
AND IB201B.LST_C_CASE_DCD = #{lstCCaseDcd}
AND IB201B.PRDT_LCLS_CD IN ('10', '11', '16', '30')
AND IB201B.PRDT_LCLS_CD IN ('90', '91')

AND IB201B.PRDT_LCLS_CD IN ('30')
AND IB201B.PRDT_LCLS_CD IN ('10', '11', '16')
ORDER BY IB201B.PRDT_CD DESC

상품총금액 */ , A.INTR_DNUM_CLC_MTH_CD /* 이자일수계산방법코드 */ , A.HLDY_PRCS_DCD /* 휴일처리구분코드 */ , A.STDR_INTRT_KND_CD /* 기준금리종류코드 */ , A.FXN_INTRT /* 고정금리 */ , A.ADD_INTRT /* 가산금리 */ , A.INTRT_CNGE_FRQC_MNUM /* 금리변동주기개월수 */ , A.HDWT_EVL_AMT /* 수기평가금액 */ , A.WEEK_MRTG_KND_CD /* 기업여신주담보종류코드 */ , A.OVDU_INTR_RT /* 연체이자율 */ , A.OVDU_INTR_RT_DCD /* 연체이자율구분코드 */ , A.TOT_RDMP_TMRD /* 총상환회차 */ , A.EQL_RDMP_AMT /* 균등상환금액 */ , A.ISTM_DTM_RDMP_AMT /* 할부일시상환금액 */ , A.RCVB_INTR_APLY_IRT /* 미수이자적용이율 */ , A.INTR_ERN_AMT /* 이자수익금액 */ , A.FNDS_PRCR_CT_AMT /* 자금조달비용금액 */ , A.INTR_CLC_END_DE_DCD /* 이자계산종료일구분코드 */ , A.INTR_HDWT_CLC_YN /* 이자수기계산여부 */ , A.GRD_CD /* 기업여신등급코드 */ , A.DSHN_RT_GRD_CD /* 기업여신부도율등급코드 */ , A.RGST_DT /* 등록일자 */ , A.CHNG_DT /* 변경일자 */ , A.HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , A.HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , A.HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , A.HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래id */ , A.GUID /* guid */ , A.EARLY_REPAY_YN /* 중도상환여부 */ , A.SGL_INV_YN /* 단독투자여부 */ FROM IBIMS201B A /* 딜승인기본 */ WHERE 1=1 AND LAST_YN = '1' AND PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd}

DISP_TLMT_MNUM , DISP_STDR_AMT_DCD , DISP_RTO , DISP_TLMT_DT , DISP_AMT , RDMP_CLM_PSBL_DT , APRN_GOLD_STUP_TRGT_YN , BDBT_RSVS_RCKN_STDR_LCLS_CD , BDBT_RSVS_RCKN_STDR_MDCL_CD , BDBT_RSVS_RCKN_STDR_SCLS_CD , BDBT_RSVS_RCKN_STDR_RTO , THCO_PTCI_AMT , PRDT_TOT_AMT , INTR_DNUM_CLC_MTH_CD , HLDY_PRCS_DCD , STDR_INTRT_KND_CD , FXN_INTRT , ADD_INTRT , INTRT_CNGE_FRQC_MNUM , HDWT_EVL_AMT , WEEK_MRTG_KND_CD , OVDU_INTR_RT , OVDU_INTR_RT_DCD , TOT_RDMP_TMRD , EQL_RDMP_AMT , ISTM_DTM_RDMP_AMT , RCVB_INTR_APLY_IRT , INTR_ERN_AMT , FNDS_PRCR_CT_AMT , INTR_CLC_END_DE_DCD , INTR_HDWT_CLC_YN , GRD_CD , DSHN_RT_GRD_CD , RGST_DT , CHNG_DT , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO , HND_TMNL_NO , HND_TR_ID , GUID , EARLY_REPAY_YN , SGL_INV_YN ) VALUES ( #{prdtCd} , ( SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SN), 0) + 1, 10, '0') FROM IBIMS201B ) , #{lastYn} , #{prdtNm} , #{prdtDsc} , #{rqsKndCd} , #{prgSttsCd} , #{cnncPrdtCd} , #{dealNo} , #{dealNm} , #{mtrNo} , #{nmcpMtrDcd} , #{nmcpMtrSn} , #{lstCCaseDcd} , #{mtrNm} , #{locoIssMngmNo} , #{invIdtrtSmitYn} , #{trgYn} , #{trgCndCtns} , #{invIdtrtSmitDt} , #{trOthrDscmNo} , #{grupItgrCrdtGrdDcd} , #{dmsCrdtGrdDcd} , #{crdtInqDt} , #{lstYn} , #{stlnCpstDcd} , #{frsMngmBdcd} , #{mngmBdcd} , #{chrrEmpno} , #{subChrrEmpno} , #{prdtClsfCd} , #{prdtMdclCd} , #{prdtLclsCd} , #{ibPrdtClsfCd} , #{ibPrdtIflwPathDcd} , #{ibPrdtPefDcd} , #{actsCd} , #{dcrbAthDcd} , #{acctJobCd} , #{acctUnJobCd} , #{acctTrCd} , #{apvlAmt} , #{ctrtAmt} , #{invAmt} , #{intrRcvnMthCd} , #{intrBnaoDcd} , #{tfdLyAplyDcd} , #{intrSnnoPrcsDcd} , #{paiRdmpDcd} , #{ortnPrdtClsfCd} , #{intrtExpDcd} , #{intrtRestFrqcMnum} , #{prnaRdmpFrqcMnum} , #{intrRdmpFrqcMnum} , #{prnaDfrPrdMnum} , #{ctrtNo} , #{ctrcPrarDt} , #{ctrcPrdMnum} , #{ctrcPrdDcd} , #{sglLoanYn} , #{rgstCbndYn} , #{apvlDt} , #{expDt} , #{edDt} , #{stupDt} , #{trustEdDt} , #{isuDt} , #{ctrtEndRsnCd} , #{ctrtEndRsnCtns} , #{trCrryCd} , #{invNtnCd} , #{ortnFndCd} , #{dskCd} , #{indvLmtDcd} , #{ctlbCtrtShpDcd} , #{ctlbBssAsstDcd} , #{socYn} , #{socDcd} , #{mrtgStupYn} , #{altnInvYn} , #{crdtRifcAplyYn} , #{frxcHdgeYn} , #{sppiSfcYn} , #{projFnnYn} , #{pplcFndYn} , #{untpFndYn} , #{pfLoanYn} , #{undwFnnYn} , #{trchAplyYn} , #{rlesFnnYn} , #{sdnTrgtYn} , #{etcCndtYn} , #{rlesFnnDetlDcd} , #{holdPrpsDcd} , #{thcoRlDcd} , #{offrSrvcDcd} , #{ncrRt} , #{rwaRt} , #{rpchPsblDt} , #{dispYn} , #{pplcCbndMpngYnDcd} , #{etcDetSctyDcd} , #{invJdgmComtNo} , #{dispDtDcd} , #{dispTlmtMnum} , #{dispStdrAmtDcd} , #{dispRto} , #{dispTlmtDt} , #{dispAmt} , #{rdmpClmPsblDt} , #{aprnGoldStupTrgtYn} , #{bdbtRsvsRcknStdrLclsCd} , #{bdbtRsvsRcknStdrMdclCd} , #{bdbtRsvsRcknStdrSclsCd} , #{bdbtRsvsRcknStdrRto} , #{thcoPtciAmt} , #{prdtTotAmt} , #{intrDnumClcMthCd} , #{hldyPrcsDcd} , #{stdrIntrtKndCd} , #{fxnIntrt} , #{addIntrt} , #{intrtCngeFrqcMnum} , #{hdwtEvlAmt} , #{weekMrtgKndCd} , #{ovduIntrRt} , #{ovduIntrRtDcd} , #{totRdmpTmrd} , #{eqlRdmpAmt} , #{istmDtmRdmpAmt} , #{rcvbIntrAplyIrt} , #{intrErnAmt} , #{fndsPrcrCtAmt} , #{intrClcEndDeDcd} , #{intrHdwtClcYn} , #{grdCd} , #{dshnRtGrdCd} , #{rgstDt} , #{chngDt} , SYSDATE , #{hndEmpno} , #{hndTmnlNo} , #{hndTrId} , #{guid} , #{earlyRepayYn} , #{sglInvYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN A.COUNT = 0 THEN #{pageDcd} || '000000001' ELSE ( SELECT pageDcd FROM ( SELECT #{pageDcd} || LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ib.PRDT_CD, 2, 10)) + 1), 9, 0) AS pageDcd FROM IBIMS201B ib WHERE SUBSTR(ib.PRDT_CD, 1, 1) = #{pageDcd} ORDER BY ib.PRDT_CD DESC ) WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM = 1 ) END AS pageDcd FROM ( SELECT COUNT(PRDT_CD) AS COUNT FROM IBIMS201B WHERE SUBSTR(PRDT_CD, 1, 1) LIKE #{pageDcd} ) A

SELECT A.DEAL_NO AS DEAL_NO , NVL(C.RGST_DT, '') AS RGST_DT , NVL( (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B AS s002b WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I011' AND s002b.CD_VL_ID = s103b.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ), '') AS PRG_STTS_CD_NM , NVL( (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B AS s002b WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I008' AND s002b.CD_VL_ID = D.CNSB_DCD ), '') AS CNSB_DCD , NVL(A.PRDT_CD, '') AS PRDT_CD , NVL(A.PRDT_NM, '') AS PRDT_NM , NVL((SELECT MAX(B.ENTP_HNGL_NM) FROM IBIMS114B B WHERE B.BSNS_RGST_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO), '') AS ENTP_HNGL_NM , A.PRDT_LCLS_CD , NVL(s002b_1.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_LCLS_CD_NM , A.PRDT_MDCL_CD , NVL(s002b_2.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_MDCL_CD_NM , A.PRDT_CLSF_CD , NVL(s002b_3.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_CLSF_CD_NM , A.IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD , NVL(s002b_4.CD_VL_NM, '') AS IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD_NM , NVL( (SELECT sum(s12b.APVL_AMT) AS LST_DEAL_SUM_RCG_AMT FROM IBIMS112B s12b WHERE 1=1 AND s12b.DEAL_NO = A.DEAL_NO) , '') AS sumRcgAmt , NVL(A.APVL_AMT , '') AS APVL_AMT , NVL(D.APVL_DT , '') AS APVL_DT , NVL(A.ACTS_CD , '') AS ACTS_CD , NVL(A.PRG_STTS_CD , '') AS PRG_STTS_CD , (SELECT MAX(EMP_NM) FROM IBIMS003B s003b WHERE EMPNO = A.CHRR_EMPNO) AS CHRR_EMPNM , A.MNGM_BDCD , ( SELECT C.DPRT_NM FROM IBIMS003B C WHERE C.DPRT_CD = A.MNGM_BDCD AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS DPRT_NM , i401b.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 기업여신약정금액 */ , (SELECT SUM(V.DEAL_EXC_AMT) FROM IBIMS402B V WHERE V.PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD AND V.LDG_STTS_CD = '1' ) AS DEAL_EXC_AMT /* 투자금액 */ , (SELECT SUM(X.DEAL_EXC_BLCE) FROM IBIMS402B X WHERE X.PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD AND X.LDG_STTS_CD = '1' ) AS DEAL_EXC_BLCE /* 투자잔액 */ FROM IBIMS201B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS103B s103b ON s103b.DEAL_NO = A.DEAL_NO AND s103b.MTR_DCD = A.NMCP_MTR_DCD AND s103b.JDGM_DCD = A.LST_C_CASE_DCD AND s103b.LAST_YN = '1' LEFT JOIN IBIMS101B C ON A.DEAL_NO = C.DEAL_NO AND C.LAST_YN = '1' LEFT JOIN IBIMS112B D ON s103b.DEAL_NO = D.DEAL_NO AND s103b.MTR_DCD = D.MTR_DCD AND s103b.JDGM_DCD = D.JDGM_DCD LEFT JOIN IBIMS003B E ON A.CHRR_EMPNO = E.EMPNO LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_1 ON A.PRDT_LCLS_CD = s002b_1.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_1.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E022' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_2 ON A.PRDT_MDCL_CD = s002b_2.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_2.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E023' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_3 ON A.PRDT_CLSF_CD = s002b_3.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_3.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E021' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_4 ON A.IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD = s002b_4.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_4.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I002' LEFT JOIN IBIMS401B i401b ON i401b.PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LAST_YN = '1'
AND A.DEAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{dealNo} || '%'
AND A.PRDT_CD LIKE '%' || #{prdtCd} || '%'
AND A.PRDT_LCLS_CD LIKE '%' || #{prdtLclsCd} || '%'
AND A.PRDT_MDCL_CD LIKE '%' || #{prdtMdclCd} || '%'
AND A.PRDT_CLSF_CD LIKE '%' || #{prdtClsfCd} || '%'
AND A.IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD LIKE '%' || #{ibPrdtClsfCd} || '%'
AND D.CNSB_DCD LIKE '%' || #{cnsbDcd} || '%'
AND A.PRG_STTS_CD LIKE '%' || #{prgSttsCd} || '%'
AND A.CHRR_EMPNO LIKE '%' || #{chrrEmpno} || '%'
AND A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO LIKE '%' || #{trOthrDscmNo} || '%'
AND C.RGST_DT >= #{rgstDt}
AND C.RGST_DT <= #{rgstEndDt}
AND D.APVL_DT >= #{apvlDt}
AND D.APVL_DT <= #{apvlEndDt}

SELECT A.DEAL_NO AS DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , A.DEAL_NM AS DEAL_NM , NVL(C.RGST_DT, '') AS RGST_DT /* 등록일자 */ , NVL( (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B AS s002b WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I011' AND s002b.CD_VL_ID = s103b.MTR_PRG_STTS_DCD ), '') AS PRG_STTS_CD_NM /* 심사진행상태코드 */ , NVL( (SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B AS s002b WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I008' AND s002b.CD_VL_ID = D.CNSB_DCD ), '') AS CNSB_DCD /* 협의체구분코드 */ , NVL(A.PRDT_CD, '') AS PRDT_CD /* 상품코드 */ , NVL(A.PRDT_NM, '') AS PRDT_NM /* 상품명 */ , NVL((SELECT MAX(B.ENTP_HNGL_NM) FROM IBIMS114B B WHERE B.BSNS_RGST_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO), '') AS ENTP_HNGL_NM /* 업체한글명 */ , A.PRDT_LCLS_CD /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ , NVL(s002b_1.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_LCLS_CD_NM /* 기업여신상품대분류코드명 */ , A.PRDT_MDCL_CD /* 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ , NVL(s002b_2.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_MDCL_CD_NM /* 기업여신상품중분류코드명 */ , A.PRDT_CLSF_CD /* 기업여신상품분류코드 */ , NVL(s002b_3.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_CLSF_CD_NM /* 기업여신상품분류코드명 */ , A.IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD /* IB상품분류코드 */ , NVL(s002b_4.CD_VL_NM, '') AS IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD_NM /* IB상품분류코드명 */ , NVL( (SELECT sum(s12b.APVL_AMT) AS LST_DEAL_SUM_RCG_AMT /* 승인금액 */ FROM IBIMS112B s12b /* 위원회안건내역(협의체안건정보) */ WHERE 1=1 AND s12b.DEAL_NO = A.DEAL_NO) , '') AS sumRcgAmt /* 딜승인금액 */ , NVL(A.APVL_AMT , '') AS APVL_AMT /* 종목승인금액 */ , NVL(D.APVL_DT , '') AS APVL_DT /* 승인일자 */ , NVL(A.ACTS_CD , '') AS ACTS_CD /* 계정과목코드 */ , NVL(A.PRG_STTS_CD , '') AS PRG_STTS_CD /* 진행상태코드 */ , (SELECT MAX(EMP_NM) FROM IBIMS003B s003b WHERE EMPNO = A.CHRR_EMPNO) AS CHRR_EMPNM /* 담당자사원번호 */ , A.MNGM_BDCD /* 부서번호 */ , ( SELECT C.DPRT_NM FROM IBIMS003B C WHERE C.DPRT_CD = A.MNGM_BDCD AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS DPRT_NM /* 부서명 */ , (SELECT SUM(NVL(DEAL_EXC_AMT,0)) FROM IBIMS402B WHERE PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD ) AS DEAL_EXC_AMT /* 투자금액 */ , (SELECT SUM(NVL(DEAL_EXC_BLCE,0)) FROM IBIMS402B WHERE PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD ) AS DEAL_EXC_BLCE /* 투자잔액 */ FROM IBIMS201B A /* 심사안건평가관리 */ INNER JOIN IBIMS401B Q ON Q.PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD LEFT JOIN IBIMS103B s103b ON s103b.DEAL_NO = A.DEAL_NO AND s103b.MTR_DCD = A.NMCP_MTR_DCD AND s103b.JDGM_DCD = A.LST_C_CASE_DCD AND s103b.LAST_YN = '1' LEFT JOIN IBIMS101B C ON A.DEAL_NO = C.DEAL_NO AND C.LAST_YN = '1' LEFT JOIN IBIMS112B D ON s103b.DEAL_NO = D.DEAL_NO AND s103b.MTR_DCD = D.MTR_DCD AND s103b.JDGM_DCD = D.JDGM_DCD LEFT JOIN IBIMS003B E ON A.CHRR_EMPNO = E.EMPNO LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_1 ON A.PRDT_LCLS_CD = s002b_1.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_1.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E022' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_2 ON A.PRDT_MDCL_CD = s002b_2.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_2.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E023' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_3 ON A.PRDT_CLSF_CD = s002b_3.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_3.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E021' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_4 ON A.IB_PRDT_CLSF_CD = s002b_4.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_4.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I002' WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.LAST_YN = '1' AND Q.CTRC_CCLC_DCD = '1' AND Q.EPRZ_CRDL_LDG_STTS_CD = '1'
AND A.DEAL_NO LIKE '%' || #{dealNo} || '%'
AND A.PRDT_CD LIKE '%' || #{prdtCd} || '%'
AND A.MNGM_BDCD LIKE '%' || #{mngmBdcd} || '%'
AND A.CHRR_EMPNO LIKE '%' || #{chrrEmpno} || '%'
AND #{ctrcDt1} BETWEEN Q.CTRC_DT AND Q.CTRC_EXP_DT
AND #{ctrcDt2} BETWEEN Q.CTRC_DT AND Q.CTRC_EXP_DT

SELECT A.PRDT_CD /* 상품코드 */ , A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO /* 거래상대방식별번호 */ , ( SELECT MAX(BZEP_NAME) FROM IBIMS010B WHERE ARDY_BZEP_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO ) AS TR_OTHR_DSCM_NM , A.RQS_KND_CD /* 기업여신신청종류코드 */ , A.PRDT_CLSF_CD /* 기업여신상품분류코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'P004' AND CD_VL_ID = PRDT_CLSF_CD ) AS PRDT_CLSF_CD_NM , A.ACTS_CD /* 계정과목코드 */ , A.APVL_DT /* 승인일자 */ , A.TR_CRRY_CD /* 거래통화코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' AND CD_VL_ID = TR_CRRY_CD ) AS TR_CRRY_CD_NM , A.APVL_AMT /* 기업여신승인금액 */ , A.STDR_INTRT_KND_CD AS STDR_INTRT_KND_CD /* 기준금리종류코드 */ , A.INTRT_CNGE_FRQC_MNUM /* 금리변동주기개월수 */ , A.INDV_LMT_DCD /* 기업여신개별한도구분코드 */ , A.PAI_RDMP_DCD /* 원리금상환구분코드 */ , A.PRNA_RDMP_FRQC_MNUM /* 원금상환주기개월수 */ , A.DEAL_NO /* 딜번호 */ , A.NMCP_MTR_DCD /* 부수안건구분코드 */ , A.LST_C_CASE_DCD /* 리스크심사구분코드 */ , A.INTR_BNAO_DCD /* 이자선후취구분코드 */ , A.INTR_RDMP_FRQC_MNUM /* 이자상환주기개월수 */ , C.CTRC_CCLC_DCD /* 약정해지구분코드 */ , C.CTRC_DT /* 약정일자 */ , C.CTRC_EXP_DT /* 약정만기일자 */ , C.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 약정금액 */ , A.FXN_INTRT AS STDR_INTRT /* 기준금리 */ , A.ADD_INTRT /* 가산금리 */ , NVL(A.FXN_INTRT,0)+NVL(A.ADD_INTRT,0) AS TOT_INTRT /* 총금리 */ , C.CHRR_EMPNO /* 담당자사원번호 */ , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = C.CHRR_EMPNO ) AS CHRR_EMP_NM , C.EPRZ_CRDL_CCLC_RSN_CD /* 해지사유코드 */ , C.CCLC_DT /* 해지일자 */ , C.CCLC_RSN_CTNS /* 해지사유내용 */ , A.PRG_STTS_CD /* 진행상태코드 */ , A.RGST_DT /* 등록일자 */ FROM IBIMS201B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS401B C ON A.PRDT_CD = C.PRDT_CD WHERE A.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd}

SELECT A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO /* 거래상대방식별번호 */ , ( SELECT MAX(BZEP_NAME) FROM IBIMS010B WHERE ARDY_BZEP_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO ) AS TR_OTHR_DSCM_NM /* 거래상대방명 */ , A.PRG_STTS_CD /* 진행상태코드 */ , A.MNGM_BDCD /* 관리부서코드 */ , ( SELECT DISTINCT(DPRT_NM) FROM IBIMS003B WHERE DPRT_CD = A.MNGM_BDCD ) AS MNGM_BDNM /* 관리부서명 */ , A.PRDT_CLSF_CD /* 상품분류코드 */ , ( SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS002B ib WHERE CMNS_CD_GRP = 'P004' AND CD_VL_ID = A.PRDT_CLSF_CD ) AS PRDT_CLSF_NM /* 상품분류명 */ , A.ACTS_CD /* 계정과목코드 */ , B.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 약정금액 */ , B.CTRC_DT /* 대출일자 */ , B.CTRC_EXP_DT /* 만기일자 */ , B.EPRZ_CRDL_APVL_AMT /* 승인금액 */ , A.PAI_RDMP_DCD /* 원리금상환구분코드 */ , A.PRNA_RDMP_FRQC_MNUM /* 원금상환주기개월수 */ , A.INTR_RDMP_FRQC_MNUM /* 이자상환주기개월수 */ , A.ISTM_DTM_RDMP_AMT /* 할부일시상환금액 */ , A.INDV_LMT_DCD /* 기업여신개별한도구분코드 */ , A.HLDY_PRCS_DCD /* 휴일처리구분코드 */ , A.PRNA_DFR_PRD_MNUM /* 원금거치기간개월수 */ , B.EPRZ_CRDL_INTR_BNAO_DCD AS INTR_BNAO_DCD /* 기업여신이자선후취구분코드 */ , B.EPRZ_CRDL_INTR_DNUM_CLC_MTH_CD AS INTR_DNUM_CLC_MTH_CD /* 기업여신이자일수계산방법코드 */ , A.OVDU_INTR_RT /* 연체이자율 */ FROM IBIMS201B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS401B B ON A.PRDT_CD = B.PRDT_CD WHERE A.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd}

SELECT B.PRDT_CD /*종목코드*/ , A.PRDT_NM /*종목명*/ , B.STDR_INTRT_KND_CD /*기준금리종류코드*/ , B.STDR_INTRT /*기준금리*/ , B.ADD_INTRT /*가산금리*/ , A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO /*거래상대방식별번호*/ , ( SELECT BZEP_NAME FROM IBIMS010B OTHR WHERE ARDY_BZEP_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO ) AS TR_OTHR_DSCM_NM /*거래상대방명*/ , B.ACTS_CD /*계정과목코드*/ , B.CTRC_DT /*약정일자*/ , B.CTRC_EXP_DT /*약정만기일자*/ , B.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /*기업여신약정금액*/ , B.EPRZ_CRDL_APVL_AMT /*기업여신승인금액*/ , (SELECT DEAL_EXC_BLCE FROM ( SELECT ib.DEAL_EXC_BLCE FROM IBIMS402B ib WHERE PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD ORDER BY EXC_SN DESC ) WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM = 1) AS DEAL_EXC_BLCE /*대출잔액*/ , A.APVL_AMT /*승인금액*/ , A.INTR_BNAO_DCD /*이자선후취구분코드*/ , A.PAI_RDMP_DCD /*원리금상환구분코드*/ , B.PRNA_DFR_PRD_MNUM /*원금거치기간개월수*/ , A.INDV_LMT_DCD /*개별한도구분코드*/ , A.APVL_DT /*승인일자*/ , A.PRG_STTS_CD /*진행상태코드*/ , A.RQS_KND_CD /*신청종류코드*/ , A.DCRB_ATH_DCD /*전결권한구분코드*/ , B.TRRC_DT /*이수관일자*/ , B.MNGM_BDCD /*관리부점코드*/ , B.CHRR_EMPNO /*담당자사원번호*/ , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.CHRR_EMPNO ) AS CHRR_EMPNM /*담당자명*/ , B.SUB_CHRR_EMPNO /*서브담당자사원번호*/ , ( SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = B.SUB_CHRR_EMPNO ) AS SUB_CHRR_EMPNM /*서브담당자명*/ FROM IBIMS201B A INNER JOIN IBIMS401B B ON B.PRDT_CD = A.PRDT_CD WHERE A.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd}
